attributes.action: Change the law on failing to name drivers on driving offence
attributes.additional_details: Police admits great concern for vehicle cloning which the genuine owner falls victim with court cases
attributes.background: People who get 6 penalty points on licence for victims of cloned vehicles

rejection.details:
We're not sure what action you would like the UK Government or Parliament to take.  
 
You could start a new petition calling on the Government or Parliament to change the law to ensure that innocent individuals are not unfairly subject to motoring prosecutions incurred by the drivers of vehicles with cloned numberplates.
